faqSection.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.description: Everything you need to know about getting started

faqs.question: How do I get started with the platform?
faqs.answer: Getting started is easy! Simply sign up for an account, complete your profile, and you'll have access to all our features including daily spins, tournaments, and trading tools.

faqs.question: What are Clash Coins and how do I earn them?
faqs.answer: Clash Coins are our platform currency that you can earn through daily spins, completing challenges, and participating in tournaments. Use them to enter premium tournaments or exchange for rewards.

faqs.question: How often can I spin the wheel?
faqs.answer: You get one free spin every 24 hours! Premium members get additional spins and better reward chances. Check your account dashboard to see when your next spin is available.

faqs.question: What kind of rewards can I win?
faqs.answer: You can win Clash Coins, free tournament entries, discount codes, exclusive access to events, and even funded trading accounts. Rewards vary based on your membership level.

faqs.question: How do I contact support?
faqs.answer: Our support team is available 24/7 through the in-app chat, email at support@platform.com, or through our community Discord server. We typically respond within 2-4 hours.

faqs.question: Is my account information secure?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your data. All transactions are secured and we never store sensitive payment information on our servers.

clashShopHero.heading: Clash Shop
